Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-56406 affecting package perl for versions less than 5.34.1-490
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-56406 affecting package perl for versions less than 5.34.1-490. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package perl is earlier than 5.34.1-490, affected by CVE-2024-56406
